About Us

Seattle Fence Contractor | Fence Installation & Design in Seattle

Local Father & Son Owned

MyFence.com is a Seattle-based startup founded by father and son duo Eric & Andrew Knudsen. We're not a franchiseâ€”just a local company with a killer name! As the original company usingFence Geniustechnology, we're spearheading efforts to modernize an outdated industry where traditional contractors build everything onsite with no customer clarity about what they'll receive. With zero subcontracting, everything is done in-house by our skilled team, combining traditional craftsmanship with innovative technology to deliver exceptional, transparent results.
